title: AI Psychology
description: This course explores the intersection of artificial intelligence and psychology, providing students with a comprehensive understanding of how AI technologies are developed with psychological principles.
learningObjectives: Understand the fundamental principles of psychology applied in AI
Learn about the key AI technologies and their psychological origins
Explore how AI can be used in psychological research
Discuss ethical considerations surrounding the use of AI in psychology

finalProjectDetails.overview: For the final project, students will develop a research proposal that utilizes AI in a psychological research context of their choosing.
finalProjectDetails.submissionInstructions: Submit the final project as a PDF document via the online submission portal by the end of week 8 of the course.
